attributes.action: Stop NHS Local Area Teams Wasting Taxpayers Money
attributes.additional_details:
"Cut Expensive Top Heavy NHS Administrative Bodies to redistribute savings  to improve overstretched A & E Services, GP Services and Mental Health Services"

Massive savings are achievable

The current structure consisting of four regional teams and twenty-five local area teams is excessively top heavy and too costly.

For example some teams employ over 180 administrators,one appears to have wasted a year on a single  "GP commissioning bid/ tender"

 Total expenditure on NHS England 's Local Area Teams is circa £40 billion per annum.

 Reduce this  down to just four effectively managed  "slim line" NHS England regional teams, releasing significant funding for reassignment to the currently overstretched front line NHS services including A & E, GP and Mental Health Services.
